name: webpub-viewer
author: EDRLab
description: A viewer application for EPUB files.

scripts.build: tsc --p . && tsc --p tsconfig-sw.json && npm run build:sass && cpx 'dist/*.{css,js}' viewer/
scripts.test: rimraf lib && tsc --p tsconfig-test.json && mocha --require jsdom-global/register --recursive lib/test
scripts.examples: rimraf examples/static/viewer examples/streamed/misc/readers/reader-NYPL && cpx 'viewer/*.{html,css,js}' examples/static/viewer && cpx 'viewer/*.{html,css,js}' examples/streamed/misc/readers/reader-NYPL && cpx 'viewer/*.{css,js}' examples/embedded/alice
scripts.about: echo 'Do not update @types/parse5 to version 5 or else it will break jsdom typings!'
